reviews.review_msg: Be prepared for some feminist teaching indeed, of the radical kind, in a first year course intended for business/ arts/ majors. (!) She definitely has her like minded fans, but some of us wanted a bit more objectivity, particularly on globalization, politics
Best prof EVER... totally agree about the motherly-ness!
Jen is very passionate about women's issues in all of her courses. She's a great prof, but whatever she teaches, be prepared for some feminist content. She's helpful and genuine. Thumbs up.
